comments.media-chrome-dependencies: Note: React (v19.1.1) is included as a transitive dependency of media-chrome through ce-la-react package. This is required for media-chrome's internal functionality and not directly used in our application. This dependency is automatically managed by npm and should not be removed.
comments.migration-note: This package.json was updated as part of the migration from Plyr to media-chrome. Plyr has been completely removed and replaced with media-chrome for improved Web Components standard compliance.
